title: IDetailCircle.JaggedOutline
description: Gets or sets whether to show a jagged outline in the detail view.
returns: True to show a jagged outline in the detail view, false to not (see Remarks )
remarks:
This property is only available when
IDetailCircle::NoOutline
is false.
To set the intensity of the jagged outline, call
IDetailCircle::ShapeIntensity
.
